name: Giant OREO Cookie Cake
author: Oreo
summary: Watch everyone's eyes light up when you bring out this fantastic cake, made to look like a giant-size OREO Cookie.  The best part? It tastes as good as it looks!
ingredients: 1 package (2-layer size) devil's food cake mix
directions: Prepare cake batter and bake in 2 (9-inch) round pans as directed on package
Invert onto wire racks; gently remove pans
Microwave chocolate and butter in small microwaveable bowl on high 2 minutes
Stir until chocolate is completely melted
Meanwhile, beat cream cheese and sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended
Gently stir in whipped topping and crushed cookies
Stack cake layers on plate, filling with cream cheese mixture
Spread top with chocolate glaze; let stand 10 minutes or until firm
